title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 November 2015 - XWiki
content:
<vmassol> has quit  
03:23 <Inge-> has quit  
03:24 <Inge-> has joined #xwiki  
06:01 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
06:34 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:48 <Steklorez> has joined #xwiki  
08:02 <Steklorez> Thanks to all who helped with email. Reinstall the version 7.3 and no bugs.  
08:03 <Steklorez> See in 1 bug on localization - http://i75.fastpic.ru/big/2015/1119/da/97f494e0d91445200a9c336e293ecfda.png  
08:39 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:41 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:41 <Ramona2> has joined #xwiki  
08:42 <Steklorez> anyone can help deal with the encoding?  
08:55 <woshilapin> has quit  
09:01 <cjd> has quit  
09:04 <Steklorez> i have problem with encoding. Part of the "ru" text in menu, and all in article = "?????????"  
09:05 <Steklorez> Why is it? deb8,tomcat8,Mysql  
09:05 <Steklorez> xwiki 7.3 last  
09:27 <Steklorez\_> has joined #xwiki  
09:27 <mflorea> has quit  
09:28 <Steklorez> has quit  
09:35 <Steklorez\_> has quit  
09:43 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:46 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:48 <Ramona2> has quit  
09:49 <Ramona2> has joined #xwiki  
09:51 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:53 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:56 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:00 <mflorea1> has joined #xwiki  
10:00 <vmassol> I think we've been missing BFD directions lately, maybe Edy is wearing out :)  
10:00 <vmassol> I guess we should consider that today is BFD  
10:00 <vmassol> starting work on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12834  
10:00 <mflorea> has quit  
10:01 <cjd> vmassol: did you happen to look at that query ?  I can't see anything wrong with it, can you ?  
10:02 <tmortagne> has quit  
10:02 <cjd> I'm asking because when I run it, I get results which might be correct but look "odd"  
10:03 <cjd> maybe we can dump the set of all activeInstalls pings into a txt file and then write some little scripts to verify the queries  
10:04 <cjd> err I mean to verify the results  
10:04 <vmassol> link?  
10:05 <vmassol> found it  
10:05 <cjd> ok  
10:05 <cjd> I'm running some queries with this and I get results I'm not sure of  
10:06 <vmassol> Im really not an expert though  
10:06 <vmassol> from just looking at the query I don't know  
10:06 <cjd> example: https://ncry.pt/p/7lBn#f-r\_8szF9Ml7Z5aLqVF8Pw1lgZmNiVRbKtw7g8ZZ3A8  
10:06 <vmassol> I would need to try it but I really can't right now  
10:06 <vmassol> I need to fix some blockers and then finish the 5 other items I have in my stack :)  
10:07 <cjd> ok  
10:07 <vmassol> sorry  
10:07 <cjd> I just want to raise the issue because I checked the query and it is almost the same as what we use for ActiveInstalls but it seems to be yielding "weird" results  
10:07 <vmassol> ok  
10:07 <cjd> so we might need to take a closer look at it  
10:07 <vmassol> I think we'll need to validate the resutls we get at some poit  
10:07 <vmassol> \*point  
10:07 <vmassol> in the default dashboard of AS  
10:08 <vmassol> just to make sure they are valid  
10:08 <cjd> If you know how to dump the pings into like csv or something, guillaume can put together a python script to cross-check them ;)  
10:08 <vmassol> now that 7.1.3 is released we should also start seeing better ping data  
10:08 <vmassol> (since I fixed a bug)  
10:08 <cjd> hmm' was it not pinging properly ?  
10:09 <vmassol> the ping count was not correct  
10:10 <vmassol> cjd: see http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12716  
10:10 <vmassol> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/23a98128dc9ab579caff697e5a81a2a799067408  
10:15 <cjd> hmm ok  
10:15 <cjd> thanks  
10:16 <cjd> as long as \_timestamp is ok, it should be fine  
10:18 <vmassol> yep I didn't change that  
10:19 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:19 <cjd> I just tried \_timestamp:[2015-01-01 TO 2015-03-31]   then \_timestamp:[2015-01-01 TO \*]   then   \_timestamp:[2015-04-01 TO \*]  and the difference is off by about 100  
10:20 <cjd> If you can point me in the right direction, I could dump the data today and try to run it manually  
10:20 <vmassol> I have no idea sorry  
10:20 <vmassol> you probably know as much as I do actually :)  
10:20 <cjd> ok thanks though  
10:21 <cjd> actually I'll ask fabio if we have good apache logs  
10:21 <vmassol> luckily there are plenty of ES on google  
10:21 <vmassol> \*ES docs  
10:22 <vmassol> first google link points to http://stackoverflow.com/questions/29770904/export-elasticsearch-result-into-csv  
10:22 <vmassol> (haven't read it)  
10:22 <cjd> thanks  
10:22 <cjd> if we have apache logs, they'll be more provably correct but if not, I'll dump it from there  
10:24 <vmassol> tmortagne: how can I make XE work on master? I'm trying to debug a problem but I can't even start XE  
10:24 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
10:24 <vmassol> going to try debugging with 7.3 but the sources will likely be off  
10:45 <Ramona2> has quit

12:16 <Steklorez> has joined #xwiki  
12:19 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
12:20 <Steklorez> People, if i change text in mail registration template, all variable not work  
12:21 <Steklorez> it's bug?  
12:21 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:24 <tmortagne> Steklorez: it's probably more related to the fact that the author of the document changed, not sure which right the email template author need to have but it might be admin  
12:24 <tmortagne> vmassol any idea ?  
12:30 <cjd> has quit  
12:31 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
12:33 <fcharton> has quit  
12:48 <fcharton> has joined #xwiki  
13:15 <Ramona3> has quit  
13:15 <Ramona2> has joined #xwiki  
13:23 <vmassol> tmortagne: PR  
13:24 <vmassol> by default we ask for PR: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/a1e3d2c08f27b5ecd7ce07046ea486890b55ec68/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-mail/xwiki-platform-mail-send/xwiki-platform-mail-send-default/src/main/java/org/xwiki/mail/script/AbstractMailScriptService.java#L98-L98  
13:24 <vmassol> component code is https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/ef268447641b5170e1de45ce7bbe4cae4568c828/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-mail/xwiki-platform-mail-send/xwiki-platform-mail-send-default/src/main/java/org/xwiki/mail/internal/script/ProgrammingRightsScriptServicePermissionChecker.java#L42-L42  
13:51 <tmortagne> Steklorez: your user need programming right in case you did not seen vmassol's message  
13:57 <Steklorez\_> has joined #xwiki  
13:57 <Steklorez> has quit  
14:02 <Steklorez\_> ok. by steps. Create xwiki 7.3, setup email settings. Test registration send mail with stadart text  
14:02 <Steklorez\_> What need to do if i need chage some text without broken variables  
14:03 <Steklorez\_> if i change message text - all variables not work (  
14:06 <Steklorez> has joined #xwiki  
14:07 <Steklorez\_> has quit  
14:10 <tmortagne> Steklorez: you need to save the document with a user having programming right  
14:30 <Steklorez> after setup all work. very strange. thank for all. good job!

17:06 <gdelhumeau> Hello  
17:07 <gdelhumeau> Do we want to have a $xwiki.getPagePreferences() ?  
17:07 <gdelhumeau> as we have $xwiki.getSpacePreferences()  
17:07 <gdelhumeau> do we want new script services instead?  
17:08 <gdelhumeau> do we still want to use the XWiki.XWikiPreferences class?  
17:09 <tmortagne> has quit  
17:20 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:41 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
17:47 <gdelhumeau> wdyt?

18:47 <vmassol> thanks Enygma`  
18:47 <Enygma`> np  
18:48 <Enygma`> seems the faq entries are not migrated and we have both entries with FAQCode.FAQClass and XWiki.FAQClass objects  
18:48 <Enygma`> so 2 classes, 2 sheets, some docs in 2.0 syntax, others in 1.0... a bit messy  
18:49 <vmassol> yes it's notmrla  
18:49 <vmassol> normal  
18:49 <vmassol> and indicated  
18:49 <vmassol> I migrate regularly FAQ entries  
18:50 <vmassol> so I have only migrated 63 right now  
18:50 <vmassol> see http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/  
18:50 <vmassol> "We have migrated to this new FAQ application and there are still FAQ entries in the http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/WebHomeOld. If you can't find the FAQ you're looking for below, try the old one."  
18:50 <vmassol> when I migrare an entry I update it based on the new status of xwiki  
18:51 <vmassol> and complete the ansewer  
18:51 <vmassol> so it's a lengthy process  
18:51 <vmassol> the goal is to have a quality FAQ at http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/
